    • Field Detail

      • enabled

        public boolean enabled
        Enables or disables DCP

      • dockButtonMode

        public ScannerConfig.DCPDockButtonMode dockButtonMode
        Button can be docked to the Left or Right Edge, Left edge only or right edge only

      • startInMode

        public ScannerConfig.DCPStartInMode startInMode
        Button start mode when the DCP shows.

      • buttonPositionTop

        public int buttonPositionTop
        Top limit button can be dragged along the edge of the screen. This is the percentage value from the screen. 0 means button can be dragged to the Top edge. 100 mean button cannot be moved from the bottom edge. The supported values are 0 to 100. Behavior is undefined for any other value This value should always be lesser than buttonPositionBottom

      • buttonPositionBottom

        public int buttonPositionBottom
        Bottom limit button can be dragged along the edge of the screen. This is the percentage value from the screen. 100 means button can be dragged to the bottom edge. 0 means button cannot be moved from the top edge. The supported values are 0 to 100. Behavior is undefined for any other value This value should always be greater than buttonPositionTop

      • dragDetectionTime

        public int dragDetectionTime
        Time (ms) that allows DCP detects a drag. If this is 100ms user can drag the DCP within first 100ms from the touch. After that it starts the scanner. Higher value will allows the user to drag the button without staring the scanner.

      • DCP

        public DCP()
